div.h2: Arrowhead United Way COVID-19 Relief Fund

a.title: Arrowhead United Way COVID-19 Relief Fund

div.a: Arrowhead United Way COVID-19 Relief Fund

a.title: Arrowhead United Way COVID-19 Relief Fund

div.a: Arrowhead United Way COVID-19 Relief Fund

div.span: Arrowhead United Way COVID-19 Relief Fund

blockquote.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 27pt; letter-spacing: 0.75pt; font-family: "&quot", serif; color: rgb(10, 18, 116);
span.a: SAN BERNARDINO UNITED COVID19 RELIEF FUND

span.style: font-size: 12pt; letter-spacing: 0.75pt; font-family: "&quot", serif; color: rgb(10, 18, 116);

strong.span: NEIGHBORS HELPING NEIGHBORS IN NEED DURING THIS TIME OF UNCERTAINTY

span.style: font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Arrowhead United Way announces San Bernardino (SB) United COVID19 Relief Fund to support those most at risk and affected by the COVID19-virus. This fund will serve to assist unsheltered residents, low-income individuals, entire families, and those who will face economic hardships due to the Corona Virus. All funds will remain local and be distributed to the 25 cities that our organization already currently serves.

span.style: font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: The SB United COVID19 Relief Fund is a secure way for individuals, non-profit organizations, and businesses to fund various programs aimed at providing relief during the prolonged closures. All donations are 100% tax-deductible.

span.style: font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: growth in homelessness due to the economic impacts of coronavirus to low-income individuals and families through emergency support such as rental, utility, food and emergency assistance.

span.style: font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: the public health response to protect our homeless neighbors; and support organizations who are on the frontlines through materials and supplies to prevent the spread of disease, as well as increasing the overall capacity of the shelter system to be able to address the crisis and meet emergency health standards.

span.style: font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: support to low-income students and their families who require assistance with technology and other means to stay connected to their academic instruction and learning.

span.style: font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: in additional support to our non-profit partners, such as the local food banks and other vital community services, so they can continue doing their critical human services work in this time of need.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

strong.span: If you are an individual or family in need of assistance or support, please dial 2-1-1 to be connected withlocal health and human services resources.

span.style: font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 27pt; letter-spacing: 0.75pt; font-family: "&quot", serif; color: rgb(10, 18, 116);
span.a: SAN BERNARDINO UNITED COVID19 FONDO DE

span.style: font-size: 16pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

blockquote.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: small; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(31, 73, 125);
span.strong: VECINOS AYUDANDO A LOS VECINOS EN LA NECESIDAD DURANTE ESTE TIEMPO DE INCERTIDUMBRE

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Arrowhead United Way anuncia el Fondo de ayuda COVID19 United de San Bernardino (SB) para apoyar a las personas ms expuestas y afectadas por el virus COVID19. Este fondo servir para ayudar a los residentes sin refugio, personas de bajos ingresos, familias enteras y aquellos que enfrentarn dificultades econmicas debido al Virus Corona. Todos los fondos seguirn siendo locales y se distribuirn a las 25 ciudades a las que nuestra organizacin ya presta servicios.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: El Fondo de ayuda SB United COVID19 es una forma segura para que individuos, organizaciones sin fines de lucro y empresas financien varios programas destinados a proporcionar ayuda durante los cierres prolongados. Todas las donaciones son 100% deducibles de impuestos.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: del crecimiento de las personas sin hogar debido a los impactos econmicos del coronavirus en individuos y familias de bajos ingresos a travs del apoyo de emergencia, como alquiler, servicios pblicos, alimentos y asistencia de emergencia.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: a la respuesta de salud pblica para proteger a nuestros vecinos sin hogar; y apoyar a las organizaciones que estn en primera lnea a travs de materiales y suministros para prevenir la propagacin de enfermedades, as como aumentar la capacidad general del sistema de refugios para poder abordar la crisis y cumplir con los estndares de salud de emergencia.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: apoyo a los estudiantes de bajos ingresos y sus familias que requieren asistencia con tecnologa y otros medios para mantenerse conectados con su instruccin y aprendizaje acadmico.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: en apoyo adicional a nuestros socios sin fines de lucro, como los bancos de alimentos locales y otros servicios comunitarios vitales, para que puedan continuar haciendo su trabajo crtico de servicios humanos en este momento de necesidad.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Si usted es un individuo o una familia que necesita asistencia o apoyo, marque 2-1-1 para conectarse con los recursos locales de salud y servicios humanos.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

div.div: 19900 National Trails Highway, Oro Grande, CA 92368
